title: isolate and reproduce a bug
description: find a minimal, deterministic reproduction and identify likely root causes.
context: be systematic and minimize moving parts; prefer binary search techniques.
instructions: 1) restate the symptom as an observable failure. 2) propose a minimal repro plan. 3) list 3-5 hypotheses with confidence and tests to falsify. 4) suggest targeted logging and instrumentation. 5) outline the most likely fix with a small diff.
